subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jon Lester improved to 6-0, and Stephen Drew hit a grand slam in Boston’s 9-2 rout of Tampa Bay, which lost its struggling ace, David Price, to a triceps injury.
snippet: Jon Lester improved to 6-0, and Stephen Drew hit a grand slam in Boston’s 9-2 rout of Tampa Bay, which lost its struggling ace, David Price, to a triceps injury.
